protein.specific_function: Tyrosine kinase of the non-receptor type, involved in the IFN-alpha/beta/gamma signal pathway. Kinase partner for the interleukin (IL)-2 receptor

go_class.description: non-membrane spanning protein tyrosine kinase activity

reference.reference_text: Wilks AF, Harpur AG, Kurban RR, Ralph SJ, Zurcher G, Ziemiecki A: Two novel protein-tyrosine kinases, each with a second phosphotransferase-related catalytic domain, define a new class of protein kinase. Mol Cell Biol. 1991 Apr;11(4):2057-65.
